content:
We're now up to three different PRs all re-implementing the unsafe code for "sound way to build an array":
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79659
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79451
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75644
(And the map implementation also has it, from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75212)

It would be great to get an official libs answer on which of these make sense as the core thing. If that's going to be ArrayVec, for example, then it'd be good to just get that implemented and have all these PRs reimplemented using it, or whatever.
@scottmcm thanks! i'll put it on the agenda for the next meeting (which is in five days)
